statements: DELETE FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE battery_level <= 20 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM robot_performance_metrics WHERE battery_level >= 90 OR robot_name = 'RoboMax';
DELETE FROM robot_metrics WHERE robot_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM robot_errors WHERE robot_id IN (SELECT robot_id FROM robot_metrics WHERE performance_metric < 0.5);
DELETE FROM robot_errors WHERE robot_id = 456 AND error_message LIKE '%critical%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM robot_metrics WHERE robot_id = 1 AND metric_name = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM robot_configuration WHERE robot_id = 2 AND configuration_key = 'max_speed';
DELETE FROM robot_errors WHERE robot_id = 3 AND error_code = 404;
DELETE FROM RobotMetrics WHERE RobotID = 1 AND CPUUtilization > 80
DELETE FROM robot_metrics WHERE robot_id = 1 AND metric_name = 'temperature';
DELETE r_error FROM robot_errors r_error INNER JOIN robot_metrics r_metric ON r_error.robot_id = r_metric.robot_id WHERE r_metric.metric_value < 0.5;
DELETE FROM robot_logs WHERE robot_id IN (SELECT robot_id FROM robot_status WHERE status = 'offline');
